meanings.definition: Any of a large class of organic compounds with a characteristic molecular structure containing four rings of carbon atoms.
meanings.sent1: The scientist explained how steroids have a unique molecular structure.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes misuse steroids to enhance performance.
meanings.sent3: The classroom was full of steroids, but they were just molecular models for chemistry class.
meanings.sent4: In the world of molecules, steroids stand out with their four carbon rings.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the intricate design of steroids was fascinating to observe.

meanings.definition: Anabolic steroids are synthetic derivatives of testosterone, used to promote muscle growth.
meanings.sent1: Bodybuilders often rely on steroids to increase muscle mass.
meanings.sent2: Doctors prescribe steroids for medical conditions like asthma.
meanings.sent3: The gym was full of talking steroids, joking about making muscles grow overnight.
meanings.sent4: In the fitness world, steroids are like a shortcut to building strength.
meanings.sent5: The impact of steroids on muscle growth is undeniable in the bodybuilding community.
